title: AI Workflow SOP Builder – Clear Steps to Save Hours

steps.title: Intake
steps.desc: You share your goals, tasks and tools via a short intake.

steps.title: Map & Draft
steps.desc: Outline each step, insert AI prompts and add Do/Don’t Guardrails.

steps.title: Checklist & QA
steps.desc: Build a one‑page Quick‑Start and a Daily Task Triage template; refine for clarity.

steps.title: Review & Finalize
steps.desc: You review; I apply one focused revision and deliver the final SOP package.

faqs.q: What if my process feels vague?
faqs.a: Even if it’s not fully defined, share your desired outcome and I’ll draft a simple workflow.

faqs.q: Which tools will this work with?
faqs.a: It’s optimized for ChatGPT and works with most note‑taking or document tools.
One round focused on small clarity and usability tweaks; major scope changes aren’t covered.

requirements: 2–3 sentences on your workflow or process
